instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css. Apply 'font-sans' (IBM Plex Sans) to body and 'font-heading' (Barlow Condensed) to h1-h3.
3. THEME: Use the 'background' color (#F8F5F2) for the main app background to avoid clinical white sterility.
4. HEBREW: Ensure all text inputs and displays support RTL if Hebrew characters are detected, or provide a global RTL toggle in settings.
5. PARENT PORTAL: This must be distinct from Admin. Use the 'hero' image as a full-screen background for the 'No-Login' entry page.
6. ADMIN DASHBOARD: Use the 'Bento' grid layout. High density, low noise. Use the 'secondary' color (#2D241E) for the sidebar.
7. KANBAN: Use horizontal scrolling. Columns should have subtle backgrounds (muted/10). Cards must be draggable (use dnd-kit or similar if possible, or just styled static for MVP).
8. FORMS: Use Shadcn form components but style the borders with 'border-input' and 'focus:border-primary'.
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards). Format: 'section-element-action' (e.g., 'login-submit-btn').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95).
Spacing: Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' for layouts. Don't cram content.
Accessibility: Ensure text on Orange (#E85D04) is White or very dark. Do not put light gray text on orange.
